appetizers.name: Palak Shorba (Spinach Soup)
appetizers.description: Baby spinach, touch of ginger and garlic pureed with spices.

appetizers.name: Spinach Feta Samosas
appetizers.description: Homemade turnovers stuffed with potatoes, spinach, and feta cheese.

appetizers.name: Sesame Chicken Naan
appetizers.description: Naan stuffed with spiced chicken topped with sesame seeds.

entrees.name: Gobi Shulgum Ki Subzi
entrees.description: Turnip, cauliflower, bell peppers cooked with light spices.

entrees.name: Methi Mango Chicken
entrees.description: Chicken cubes cooked with fenugreek and a touch of mango pulp in a light curry sauce.

entrees.name: Kashmiri Lamb Curry
entrees.description: Lamb cubes cooked with a cardamom infused curry sauce.

entrees.name: Konkani Chilly Shrimp
entrees.description: Shrimps cooked with onions tomatoes jalapenos, light spices and a touch of coconut milk.
